EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Microservices with Pivotal CF and Spring Cloud 10AM.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Architecting for Continuous Delivery: Microservices with Pivotal CF and Spring Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Architecting for Continuous Delivery: Microservices with Pivotal CF and Spring Cloud. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, October 21, 2014
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=296825514> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195617&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 296 825 514
Thank you,
